title: Lak front banglaw for sale
details:
Real Solutions for your Real Estate Needs

බ්‍රෝකර්වරැ අනවයයි

ඔබ සැබැ නිර්ව්‍යාජ ගැණුම්කරැවෙක් නම්.......
ලිපිනයන් පාරවල් විස්තර අසමින් අපහසුතාවයට පත් නොවි මෙම දේපළට පැමිනිමට පළමුව කරුණාකර පැහැදිලිවම කලින් දින වේලාවක් වේන්කර ගෙන පැමිනෙන්න එසේ නොමැතිව අපහසු තාවයට පත් නොවන්න කරුණාකර දැන්විම සමිපුර්නයෙන් කියවීමෙන් පසුව අප අමතන්න.

CALLS MORN ING 7 AM TO 1 PM EVENING 5 PM TO 7 PM ONLY
SKYPE OPEN 24 HRS FOR OVERSEES CLIENT

SITE VISIT WITH EARLY CONFIRMATION ONLY
GENUINE BUYERS WELCOME

CALL ON GIVEN NO; OR EMAIL ………PLEASE NO TIME WASTERS

BANK LOAN CAN ARRANGE WITHING 15 DAYS

Price 39.5 million 395 Lkhs negotiable
Clear Deeds

LAKE FRONT BAN-GLOW

Stunning house Luxury type 3 story + roof top house with ample space built on 14 perch with an lush green garden

3 story House consist with 6 BR + 4 sitting area +pantry + kitchen + store + library + washing ...etc 2 units house / floor is made by tiles and many more

House also overlooks the BORALESGAMUWA LAKE and birds are also visible during the season periods, giving a very lovely view that any nature lover would simply fall in love with. A bit of rowing could also be done

This beautiful bungalow is located close to Maharagama as well as to Boraleasgamuwa too

just 400 m to high level road in Alhena road –in facing to Boralesgamuwa lake covered by a solid and high security wall.

3 minutes drive from house to high level road.

A very quiet and serene neighborhood with a decent crowd.

.Also can step in to lake side walking track from back of house garden.

suitable for even foreigner


ROHITHA PERERE REAL ESTATE Reg No; W.J 16094 Est:1996 NO 99 /1C High Level Road Mahragama Srilanka

e-mail orpsrilanka@yahoo.com Skype rohitha350
